Is there a preference for koshirae for certain schools of swords. To 
clarify, I have a certain feeling that I should see or at least 
expect to see Hizen blades in Higo koshirae. They seen to fit for 
some reason unbeknownst to me. 
So is there a school of koshirae that is more suited to say Yamashiro 
blades, or swords of the Echizen province and things like that or is 
it more just the taste of the owner. 

I was thinking that a sword from say Iwami province probably wouldn't 
have Edo koshirae or Higo for that matter as they would be to far 
away and the owner would select a local or more local artisan unless 
they traveled or were of a higher stature and had no budget 
constraints. 

any thoughts on this ?? 

cheers 

Rich
